preqs: For students enrolled in a PhD in mechanical, aerospace or mechatronics only.

rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {02} and Any co-req unit in {ERU0005, ERU0013})

description: This unit addresses the scientific method in relation to engineering research including formal logic, how to formulate a hypothesis; experimental design and analysis; presentation of a scientific argument; the philosophy of research and the intellectual tradition. The unit will explore research in industry, and the commercialisation pathway.
